channel.title: Best of Gainesville Weekly Minipod
channel.description: Bringing you all the best events, development, and culture that Gainesville has to offer in a short-form podcast. Best of Gainesville Weekly is hosted by Ty Rucarean and is done in collaboration with Best of Gainesville and Tess Media. For more information or if you want to reach out you can follow @bestofgainesville on Instagram or email bestofgainesville@gmail.com.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Bringing you all the best events, development, and culture that Gainesville has to offer in a short-form podcast. Best of Gainesville Weekly is hosted by Ty Rucarean and is done in collaboration with Best of Gainesville and Tess Media.

item.title: EP 12 | Weekend of August 31st
item.description: Ty Rucarean and Taylor Shrum highlight this weekends 5 hottest spots in Gainesville for this quick bite-sized mini-pod. If you want to get in touch with us or are interested in writing for our digital and print publication, DM us on Instagram @bestofgainesville or email us at bestofgainesville@gmail.com.

item.title: Ep 4 | July 4th and Weekend of July 6th
item.description: For this July 4th special, Ty has guest host Taylor Shrum on to highlight the best firework shows in Gainesville. The pair also hit 5 things to do this weekend in Gainesville in this quick bite-sized mini-pod. item.title: Ep 1 | Welcome to Best of Gainesville Weekly! (Fathers Day Weekend)
item.description: An introduction to the format of the podcast and our intentions. This week we hung out with Taylor Shrum from the Tess Media team and talked about the best things to do this Fathers Day weekend. If you want to get in touch with us, DM us on Instagram @bestofgainesville or email us at bestofgainesville@gmail.com.
item.itunes:subtitle: An introduction to the format of the podcast and our intentions. This week we hung out with Taylor Shrum from the Tess Media team and talked about the best things to do this Fathers Day weekend.
